text: Arthur Rivera Defensor Jr. (born October 8, 1969) is a Filipino politician who served as the Governor of Iloilo since 2019. He is formerly as the member of the 18th Congress of House of Representatives of the Philippines for Third District from 2010 until 2019. Defensor Jr. is the son of former governor and congressman, Arthur Defensor Sr. ==References== * * * * ==External links== *Province of Iloilo Official Website Category:Living people Category:Governors of Iloilo Category:PDP–Laban politicians Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Philippines from Iloilo Category:People from Iloilo City Category:1969 births
title: Arthur Defensor Jr.
